message.content:
Subject: Notice of Resignation

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to formally inform you of my decision to resign from my position as [Job Title] at [Company Name], effective [Last Day of Work, e.g., two weeks from today].

It has been a pleasure working with the team and contributing to the company's success over these past [duration of your employment]. However, after much consideration, I have decided to pursue new opportunities that align more closely with my career goals and personal aspirations.

I want to express my sincere gratitude for the support, guidance, and opportunities you have provided me during my tenure at [Company Name]. It has been a rewarding experience, and I am thankful for the skills and knowledge I have gained. I will always cherish the relationships I have built within the organization.

During my remaining time here, I am fully committed to ensuring a smooth transition of my responsibilities. Please let me know how I can assist in this process, including transferring any pertinent information or projects to my replacement or colleague(s). I am also available to help train my replacement for a period of [duration] if needed.

Once again, thank you for the opportunity to work at [Company Name]. I wish you and the company all the best in future endeavors. Please let me know if there is anything else I can do to facilitate this transition.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Contact Information]
